plot: Julie visits Victor's former home where an elderly neighbor tells her the reason for the massacre of his family. Berg and Jerome also decide to visit the hamlet where Victor's family were murdered and find his old drawings.

Thirty-five years ago, Virgil was a small-time thief in town that was expelled home by his father and captured by Milan, who was a kind of vigilante, and his men. Later Virgil was released by Serge, but he was murdered by Milan, when he tried to escape through the woods. Adele's baby disappears and she calls the police; however, Alcide tells her that based on the statement of Chloe and the doctor, they believe Adele is the responsible. Serge locks Milan in an underground compartment in his house; when he returns, Serge shoots him again. Lena needs to be treated, and Claire goes to a house to seek out bandages and medicine. She stumbles upon the man that brought her home when she was attacked by the Returned. Julie goes to the former house of Victor and learns from a neighbor that the boy was considered evil by the hamlet and blamed for the collapse of the dam. Later, Berg and Jerome also visit Victor's house. Lucy goes to Serge's house to take care of Milan. Meanwhile, Simon returns the baby to Adele. Serge releases Toni at the Helping Hand.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
